bibl.title: Institute of Classical Studies
bibl.seg: Cavallo Guglielmo and Herwig Maehler, Greek Bookhands of the Early Byzantine Period: A.D. 300-800. (BICS Supplement. 47.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1987, 4°, xii-153 pp. 1 front., 56 pll., dont plusieurs dépl.

C.R. par Giacomo Bono, RivFil 116 (1988) pp. 251-253. - Fritz Bornmann, AeR N.S., 33 (1988) p. 85. - Tiziano Dorandi, Prometheus 14 (1988) pp. 191-192. - Antonietta Porro, Aevum 63 (1989) pp. 124-125. - N.G. Wilson, CR N.S., 39 (1989) pp. 127-128. - Alain Blanchard, REG 103 (1990) pp. 353-354. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 64 (1989) Nos 127-128, pp. 338-339. - S.R. Slings, Mnemosyne 4e s., 43 (1990) pp. 187-194 (concerne aussi E.G. Turner, Greek Manuscripts of the Ancient World. 2nd ed., London, 1987). - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 59 (1990) pp. 466-467. - Alina Brzóstkowska, Eos 77 (1989) pp. 364-367. - Gabriella Messeri Savorelli, APapyrol 1 (1989) pp. 148-149. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 38 (1992) p. 70. - Kurt Treu, Klio 72 (1990) pp. 614-616 (concerne aussi E.G. Turner, Greek Manuscripts of the Ancient World, 2nd ed., London, 1987). - Ugo Zanetti, AnalBoll 109 (1991) pp. 424-425 (concerne aussi E.G. Turner, op. cit.).
